author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
<@!425572898787426305> <@!291925846556540928> 
I've just implemented Kintsugi, and have some notes (most of them just observations might not be actionable):
- Having the blockhash in ExecutePayloadResponse produces really ugly code
- Maybe ForkChoice should take an object not the raw parameters
- The response in forkChoiceUpdated should have the payloadID
- If the EL can change the coinbase/feerecipient, why is it part of the payloadID
- Making ForkChoiceUpdated and PreparePayload one message makes testing pretty messy
